name: Ratalie's Escape
description:
Made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 52.

Ratalie the rat was bitten by a magic cat that belonged to a witch.

Ratalies friends are threatend by the wheat harvester coming to destroy their homes. Use your powers to help them escape.

A and D to move
W to jump
1 and 2 to use abilities - requires you to eat 10 kernels
EMP slows down the harvester
Telepathy warns other rats close by
